title: Discrete time DDP
text:
Show code
using Pkg
Pkg.activate("..")
Pkg.instantiate()



  Activating project at `~/blog/Dailynote/OptimalControl`






Show code
using Plots
plt = plot(sin, 0, 2π)
display(plt)





  
    
  



  
    
  



  
    
  


































Mechanical systems on Lie groups are often modeled as left-invariant control systems (Jackson, Tracy, and Manchester 2021).




Jackson, Brian E., Kevin Tracy, and Zachary Manchester. 2021. “Planning with Attitude.” IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters 6 (3): 5658–64. https://doi.org/10.1109/LRA.2021.3052431.

title: Optimal Control
text: Knowing various methods for formulating and solving optimal control problems, including the use of numerical methods for solving them.
